test.test-assertion: Servlet implements the javax.servlet.Servlet interface either directly or indirectly through GenericServlet or HttpServlet. Please refer to Java Servlet 2.4 Specification Section #SRV.2.3 for further information.

For [ pws.war ] Servlet class [ org.apache.axis.transport.http.AxisServlet ] directly or indirectly implements javax.servlet.Servlet. For [ pws.war ] Servlet class [ org.apache.myfaces.shared_tomahawk.util.servlet.SourceCodeServlet ] directly or indirectly implements javax.servlet.Servlet. For [ pws.war ] Servlet class [ org.apache.struts.action.ActionServlet ] directly or indirectly implements javax.servlet.Servlet. For [ pws.war ] Servlet class [ javax.faces.webapp.FacesServlet ] directly or indirectly implements javax.servlet.Servlet. For [ pws.war ] Servlet class [ de.hopfit.util.ValidateServlet ] directly or indirectly implements javax.servlet.Servlet. For [ pws.war ] Servlet class [ org.apache.axis.transport.http.AdminServlet ] directly or indirectly implements javax.servlet.Servlet.

test.test-assertion: Servlet session-timeout element defines the default session timeout interval expressed in whole minutes. Please refer to Java Servlet 2.4 Specification Section #SRV.13.3 for further information.
test.test-description: For [ pws.war ] Servlet session-timeout [ 15 ] element defines the default session timeout interval expressed in whole minutes.

test.test-assertion: The deployment descriptor instance file must not contain multiple session-config elements.
test.test-description: For [ pws.war ] The session-config element is specified correctly.

test.test-assertion: JAR file contains the XML-based deployment descriptor. Please refer to Java Servlet 2.4 Specification Section #SRV.9.5 for further information.
test.test-description: For [ pws.war ] Found deployment descriptor XML file [ WEB-INF/web.xml ].

test.test-assertion: Content of the url-pattern element must follow the rules specified in the servlet specification. Please refer to Java Servlet 2.4 Specification Section #SRV.11.2 for further information.
test.test-description: For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ *.source ] within [ pws ] follows the rules specified in the servlet specification. For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ /servlet/AxisServlet ] within [ pws ] follows the rules specified in the servlet specification. For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ *.jws ] within [ pws ] follows the rules specified in the servlet specification. For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ /services/* ] within [ pws ] follows the rules specified in the servlet specification. For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ *.do ] within [ pws ] follows the rules specified in the servlet specification. For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ *.jsf ] within [ pws ] follows the rules specified in the servlet specification. For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ /validate ] within [ pws ] follows the rules specified in the servlet specification. For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ /servlet/AdminServlet ] within [ pws ] follows the rules specified in the servlet specification. For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ *.jsf ] within [ pws ] follows the rules specified in the servlet specification. For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ /faces/* ] within [ pws ] follows the rules specified in the servlet specification.

For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ /servlet/AdminServlet ] within [ pws ] follows the rules specified in servlet specification. For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ *.jsf ] within [ pws ] follows the rules specified in servlet specification. For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ /faces/* ] within [ pws ] follows the rules specified in servlet specification.

For [ pws.war ] url-pattern [ /faces/* ] within [ pws ] does not contain carriage return or line feed character.
